tool_description: Validates kitchen design against local building codes and safety requirements to ensure compliance.

jurisdiction.description: Local building jurisdiction or city name

counter_space_linear_feet.description: Total linear feet of counter space

gfci_protected.description: Whether countertop outlets are GFCI protected

range_clearances_met.description: Whether range clearance requirements are met

error_messages: Unknown jurisdiction: Building code data not available for specified location.
Insufficient counter space: Minimum 11 linear feet of counter space required.
Aisle width violation: Minimum 36-inch aisle width required for accessibility.
Inadequate ventilation: Kitchen exhaust ventilation below minimum CFM requirements.
Electrical code violation: Insufficient circuits or missing GFCI protection.
Range clearance violation: Inadequate clearances around cooking appliances.
usage: Input kitchen design specifications and location to verify compliance with local building codes and identify any violations that must be addressed.

code_compliant.description: Whether design meets all code requirements
